entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
